metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11655 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
SQLite through 3.31.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a malformed window-function query because the AggInfo object's initialization is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11655` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.31.1-5
libsqlite3-0 - 3.31.1-5
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.31.1-5
sqlite3 - 3.31.1-5
sqlite3-tools - 3.31.1-5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream bug, introduced in 3.25

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-5').
